content.text: We are thrilled to introduce the new STEM Apprenticeship Pathway Guide – an accessible and visually rich resource designed to showcase the huge potential of STEM careers across government.

This guide brings STEM apprenticeships to life. It demystifies what they are, highlights the incredible benefits they offer, and sets out exactly how to get started. Whether you are a civil servant exploring your next career move, a student considering your future, an educator supporting learners, or a prospective apprentice, this guide is built to inspire action.
